attributes.action: NO Blackwall, Silvertown tunnel charges, NO ULEZ expansion.
attributes.additional_details: We are fed up of taxes. Reverse them. Stop them
attributes.background: Reverse ULEZ. NO to the Blackwall tunnel charges. NO to the Silvertown tunnel charges. This is not about pollution or congestion, this is just stealth taxes and discrimination against motorists trying to earn a living.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Ultra Low Emission Zones and toll charges are the responsibility of local authorities and councils.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You may also wish to sign this petition:

Remove local authority powers to introduce LTNs, CAZs, LEZs and ULEZs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637517
